sourcesContent:
import styles from './wishList.module.scss' import TopNavBar from 'components/TopNavBar' import { HeartIcon } from 'assets/svgs' import { MouseEvent } from 'react' import store from 'store' interface SearchStructure { authors: string[] contents: string datetime: string isbn: string price: number publisher: string sale_price: number status: string thumbnail: string title: string translators: any[] url: string } const WishList = () => { const storeData = store.get('likeStore') const handleClick = (e: MouseEvent) => { const { value } = e.currentTarget.dataset const { className } = e.currentTarget if (className.split('_')[1] === 'deleteBtn') { store.set( 'likeStore', storeData.filter((item: SearchStructure) => item.isbn !== value) ) } } return (
{storeData.length > 0 ? (
    {storeData.map((item: SearchStructure) => (
  • {item.title}
    {item.authors}
    {item.price}원
    • ))}
) : (
좋아요를 누른 항목이 없습니다.
)}
) } export default WishList
